casebody.data:
SMITH
v.
PARMAEI. No. 141P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. Michael E. Ciochina, Asheville, for Christiane N. Smith.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of October 2005 by Defendant for "Petition for Plain Error Review Under N.C.G.S. 7A-31(A)(B)(1)(2)(3)(4)(C)(1)(2)(3)(D)":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of March 2006."
